faq.headline: Questions? We Answer
faq.description: Clear and objective answers so you know exactly what to expect.
faq.q1: How long until the website is live?
faq.a1: Essential Website: 5-7 business days. Professional Website: 10-15 business days. Sales Page: 7-14 business days. We agree on the exact timeline before starting.
faq.a2: During this period, we fix any errors and make small adjustments at no additional cost. After this period, we offer an optional monthly maintenance plan.
faq.a3: Not included in the base price. If you already have them, we use yours. If not, we help you register (from ~€50/year). This way you maintain full control.
faq.q4: Do I need to provide texts and images?
faq.a4: Ideally yes, as you know your business. If you don't have them, texts are included in the Sales Page package. In other packages, we can create them as an extra.
faq.q5: What is 'Technical SEO' and what's included?
faq.a5: Technical SEO prepares the site to be indexed by Google: sitemap, robots.txt, titles, descriptions, Search Console configured. We don't promise rankings — that depends on several factors — but we guarantee the site is optimized.
faq.a6: Each package includes a number of revisions: 2 in Essential, 3 in Professional, 5 in Premium Pages. One revision = one round of changes after presenting the initial version.
faq.q7: What's the difference between a '2-page website' and a 'Sales Page (Landing Page)'?
faq.a7: The Essential Website is a digital business card. The Sales Page is focused on performance: persuasive copy, conversion structure (CTA, social proof, FAQ), and complete tracking (GA4, Tag Manager, Pixel) for ad campaigns.
faq.q8: Does the Landing Page include tracking (GA4, Tag Manager, Pixel)?
faq.a8: Yes! The Sales Page includes GA4, Tag Manager and Facebook/Google Ads Pixel configured, with conversion events (button clicks, form submissions) tracked.
faq.q9: Can I start with Essential and upgrade later?
faq.a9: Of course! Many clients start with the Essential Website and later upgrade to Professional or add a Sales Page for campaigns. We adapt to your pace.
faq.q10: Does the website work well on mobile?
faq.a10: Yes, absolutely. All websites are 100% responsive: mobile, tablet and computer. It's a priority, not an extra.
faq.q11: Is there a monthly maintenance plan? What does it include?
faq.a11: Yes, we offer an optional plan after the included support period. Includes: security updates, backups, small content changes, and technical support. Price on request.
faq.a12: 50% to start, 50% on delivery. For larger projects, we split into more installments. We accept bank transfer and MBWay.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.metaDescription: Império Web Privacy Policy. Learn how we collect, use and protect your personal data.
privacy.section1Text: Império Web is a company specialized in creating professional websites, landing pages, digital automations, lead capture and integrations for small and medium businesses in Portugal and the European Union.
privacy.section2Text: We may collect the following types of personal data:
privacy.section2Item3: Communication data: messages sent through forms, WhatsApp or email
privacy.section2Item4: Technical data: IP address, browser type, device, pages visited, date and time of access
privacy.section3Item1: Contact forms and quote requests on the website
privacy.section3Item2: Communications via WhatsApp, phone or email
privacy.section3Item3: Analytics tools (such as Google Analytics) for technical data
privacy.section4Item1: Respond to your contact and quote requests
privacy.section4Item3: Provide contracted services (website creation, automations, etc.)
privacy.section4Item6: Send marketing communications (only with your prior consent)
privacy.section5Text: The processing of your data is based on:
privacy.section5Item1: Contract execution: when necessary to provide the requested services
privacy.section5Item2: Pre-contractual steps: to respond to quote requests
privacy.section5Item4: Legitimate interest: to improve our services and ensure website security
privacy.section6Text: Your data may be shared with:
privacy.section6Extra: Sharing is done only when necessary for service provision and with entities that ensure adequate levels of data protection.
privacy.section7Text1: Your personal data is kept only for the period necessary for the purposes for which it was collected, including compliance with legal, contractual, accountability or archiving obligations.
privacy.section7Text2: Customer data is kept during the contract term and for the legally required period after its termination. Contact data not converted into customers is deleted after 24 months of inactivity.
privacy.section8Text: Under GDPR, you have the right to:
privacy.section8Item1: Access: know what data we have about you
privacy.section8Item3: Erasure: request deletion of your data ("right to be forgotten")
privacy.section8Item4: Objection: object to processing in certain circumstances
privacy.section8Item5: Portability: receive your data in a structured format
privacy.section8Item6: Withdraw consent: at any time, without affecting the lawfulness of prior processing
privacy.section8Extra: To exercise your rights, contact us at
privacy.section9Text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, loss, destruction or alteration. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacy.section10Text1: Our website may use cookies and similar technologies to improve your browsing experience and for analytics purposes. Cookies are small text files stored on your device.
privacy.section10Text2: You can manage cookie preferences in your browser settings. Disabling some cookies may affect website functionality.
privacy.section11Text: For questions related to privacy and data protection, contact us:
privacy.section11Extra: You also have the right to file a complaint with the National Data Protection Commission (CNPD) if you believe your rights have not been respected.
privacy.section12Text: This privacy policy may be updated periodically. Any changes will be published on this page with the revised last update date. We recommend that you check this page regularly.
